title: Ep 76: Living In The Slog (and Doree Returns!)
itunes:title: Ep 76: Living In The Slog (and Doree Returns!)
itunes:subtitle: Our very own Doree Shafrir returns from maternity leave and hops back in the podcasting saddle this week. Hurray! Doree discusses her last days of pregnancy, her experience with childbirth, and her new life as a mother. Kate recounts everything she did...
description:
Our very own Doree Shafrir returns from maternity leave and hops back in the podcasting saddle this week. Hurray! Doree discusses her last days of pregnancy, her experience with childbirth, and her new life as a mother. Kate recounts everything she did whilst Doree was away: working on her body image issues, digging into work, and of course — missing Doree. Plus they both discover they've become vegetarian-curious (and shed some tears, too).

Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast,@katespencer,@doree, Twitter:@forever35pod, and in ourFacebook group( password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website,Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Mistress of the Ritz by Melanie Benjamin
  • LiquidIV - Get 25% off at liquidiv.com when you use promo code FOREVER35.
  • HelloFresh - Go to hellofresh.com/forever80 and enter promo code FOREVER80 for $80 off your first month.
  • Betabrand - Visit betabrand.com/forever35 to get 20% off your first pair of the Dress Pant Yoga Pants.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
